pages.name: Twilight Portal
pages.text: Once you finish digging and planting the formation, fill it with water!

pages.title: Valid Portal Criteria
pages.text: $(li)Grass Blocks can be swapped out for any earth-y block. Examples: Farmland, Mycelium, Uberous Soil $(li)Poppies can be switched out for any other flower, leaf, or crop! $(li)A portal can be any size as long as there are less than 64 water spaces. You can even make it different shapes too! $(li)The bottom of the portal $(l)MUST$() stay as dirt.

pages.title: Activation Item
pages.text: Drop a diamond into the water!

pages.name: Completed Twilight Portal
pages.text: If you see the purple swirls, hop right in!
